sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' const EditModal = ({ application }) => { // Initializing state with the existing data const [data, setData] = useState({ company: '', role: '', location: '', pay_range: '', source: '', date: '', call: '', progress: '' }); useEffect(() => { if (application) { setData({ company: application.company, role: application.role, location: application.location, pay_range: application.pay_range || '', source: application.source, date: application.date, call: application.call || '', progress: application.progress || '' }); } }, [application]); return ( <>

Edit Application

); }; export default EditModal
